mapper.select: SELECT MGT_NO, A.AREA_NO, STEP_NO, CON, TO_CHAR(DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DT, AREA_NM FROM STEP_MGT S JOIN AREA A ON (S.AREA_NO = A.AREA_NO) WHERE S.DEL = 1
